Set.Text: Each source of [ICON_RES_GOLD] Gold, [ICON_RES_SILVER] Silver and [ICON_RES_COPPER] Copper worked by this City produces +2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have at least one of these resources mined nearby.
The Mint can only be constructed in a city with improved gold, silver, or copper resources nearby. The Mint increases the [ICON_GOLD] Gold output of each such resource the city has access to.
